entry.title: Bitcoin Testing Project
entry.summary: The conversation thread starts with someone named Arklan sharing two quotes about light and darkness. The next message is from Steve, thanking Peter for his response to a question about the Bitcoin Foundation. Peter then realizes he didn't reply-all and sends his detailed response to the list, saying that people can ignore it if they don't care. The thread ends with an advertisement for New Relic APM and a link to join the Bitcoin-development mailing list.
